title: Alatar, Final Envoy (13U28)
text:
Set:	Bloodlines
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Follower
Game Text:	Aid - (2). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (2) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may reinforce a [Gandalf] token. While you can spot a [Gandalf] companion, each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1.
